text: I want to write a CSS code to make a section sticky on leadpages
Ok, resolved the error, but the above code isn't rendering the modules within the last row with nested columns.
Nevermind, figured out the issue! Turns out that every dnd_column has to have a dnd_row in it.

Then I'd recommend to create <https://developers.HubSpot.com/beta-docs/guides/cms/content/templates/drag-and-drop/sections#section-template-files|reusable sections> since they're support custom CSS classes and trigger everything via those classes
